00001 #include <avr/io.h>
00002 enum {
00003   PWM0,
00004   PWM1,
00005   PWM2,
00006   PWM3
00007 };
00008 
00009 void initPWM(void){
00010 
00011   // B5 B6 PIN 4 5 LED WITHE 2 3 => OC1A OC1B
00012 /*  TCCR1A = _BV(WGM10) | _BV(WGM11) | _BV(COM1A1) | _BV(COM1A0)| _BV(COM1B1) | _BV(COM1B0);
00013   TCCR1B = _BV(CS10);
00014 
00015   DDRB |= _BV(PINB4) | _BV(PINB5);
00016   OCR1A = 1023;                 /* set PWM value to 0 */
00017  // OCR1B = 1023;
00018   
00019   // E4 PIN37 41 LED WITHE 1 0=> OC3B OC3A
00020   TCCR3A = _BV(WGM10) | _BV(WGM11) | _BV(COM3B1) | _BV(COM3B0) | _BV(COM3A1) | _BV(COM3A0);
00021   TCCR3B = _BV(CS10);
00022   DDRE |= _BV(PINE4) | _BV(PINE3);
00023   OCR3A = 1023;
00024   OCR3B = 1023;
00025 }
00026 
00027 void setPWM(char pin, int val){
00028   switch(pin){
00029     case PWM0 : OCR1A = val; break;
00030     case PWM1 : OCR1B = val; break;
00031     case PWM2 : OCR3A = val; break;
00032     case PWM3 : OCR3B = val; break;
00033     default : return ;
00034   }
00035 }
00036 
00037 int getPWM(char pin){
00038   switch(pin){
00039     case PWM0 : return OCR1A; break;
00040     case PWM1 : return OCR1B; break;
00041     case PWM2 : return OCR3A; break;
00042     case PWM3 : return OCR3B; break;
00043     default : return -1;
00044   }
00045 }

00056 void initADC(void)

00058         ADMUX =  (1<<REFS0);    // Voltage reference
00059         ADMUX &= ~(1<<REFS1);
00060         ADMUX |= (0<<ADLAR)|    // ADC Left Adjust result
00061                  (0<<MUX3)|     // ADC0 pin configuration
00062                  (0<<MUX2)|     // ADC0 pin configuration
00063                  (0<<MUX1)|     // ADC0 pin configuration
00064                  (0<<MUX0);     // ADC0 pin configuration
00065                                 
00066         ADCSRA = (1<<ADEN)|             // Enable ADC Converter
00067                         (0<<ADSC)|      // Bit to start the ADC converter
00068                         (0<<ADFR)|      // Free Running Select
00069                         (1<<ADIF)|      // ADC Interrupt Flag
00070                         (1<<ADIE)|      // ADC interrupt enable
00071                         (1<<ADPS2)|     //
00072                         (1<<ADPS1)|     // ADC prescaler select bits Division factor : 128
00073                         (1<<ADPS0);     //

00077
